thread.title: Keep America Beautiful Encourages America to #fallBeautiful

author: cbs8
title: Keep America Beautiful Encourages America to #fallBeautiful
text:
Keep America Beautiful, Inc.
National Engagement and Fundraising Campaign Invites People to Enjoy and Share their Love ofAmerica's Beautiful Places, While Supporting the Work of Keep America Beautiful
STAMFORD, Conn. , Oct. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- Keep America Beautiful, the nation's leading nonprofit which envisions a country where every community is a clean, green and beautiful place to live, launched a new national engagement and fundraising campaign today, encouraging people to #fallBeautiful across America.
The national #fallBeautiful campaign celebrates one of the best times of year to enjoy America's clean, green and beautiful places, and provides motivation and ideas to help people to get outdoors by exploring a trail, enjoying a tailgating party, planting a garden or visiting a park, among other activities.
"The support we and our network of more than 600 Keep America Beautiful affiliates receive from millions of volunteers and participants in our programs is the lifeblood of our organization," said Mike Rosen , senior vice president/marketing and communications, Keep America Beautiful. "The fall is such a wonderful time of year to get outdoors and enjoy beautiful public spaces our affiliates work so hard to preserve and protect for the future. We're excited to see how people will #fallBeautiful across America and help to ensure that beauty is our lasting signature."
Individuals can learn how to #fallBeautiful with tips on how to keep parks beautiful, plant beautiful gardens or host an eco-party; share photos with family and friends enjoying the outdoors using #fallBeautiful; and donate to Keep America Beautiful to support its nationwide efforts to end littering in America, increase recycling in America, and beautify America's communities at act.kab.org/fallbeautiful .
About Keep America Beautiful
At Keep America Beautiful, we want to ensure that beauty is our lasting signature. A leading national nonprofit, Keep America Beautiful inspires and educates people to take action every day to improve and beautify their community environment. We envision a country where every community is a clean, green, and beautiful place to live. Established in 1953, Keep America Beautiful provides the expertise, programs and resources to help people end littering in America, increase recycling in America, and beautify America's communities. The organization is driven by the work and passion of more than 600 community-based Keep America Beautiful affiliates, millions of volunteers, and the support of corporate partners, municipalities, elected officials, and individuals. To learn how you can donate or take action, visit kab.org . Follow us on Twitter and Instagram , like us on Facebook , or view us on YouTube .
